Views¶

WordsOverTime.words.views.genHash()¶

Generate a hash that can be used to uniquely identify a request

WordsOverTime.words.views.graph(request, hash)¶

Renders the graph to a client corresponding to the request identified by the hash

WordsOverTime.words.views.read_words(words_file)¶

Read a list words from a text file Helper function for processing form data

WordsOverTime.words.views.success(request)¶

Main view for handling form data
